story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_0100:
Uh-oh! Look at all those Team Rocket grunts!
Do you think this might be their hideout?
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_0200:
It’d be great for us if it were that easy, but this
doesn’t seem right. It sticks out like a sore thumb.
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_0400:
Yeah, most likely. But if there’s a whole bunch of
them gathered in one spot, there’s gotta be a
reason for it.
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_0500:
I bet if we go further in, we’ll get to the
bottom of this!
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_0600:
Wait, we’re just barging in? Isn’t that
a bit reckless?
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_0700:
That was amazing! There were so many of them,
but we held our ground!
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_0800:
How’s everyone doing? Are your Pokémon all
holding up OK?
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_0900:
Yes! Thanks for taking on so many of those
grunts, Blue!
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_1000: OK, let’s keep going. It’s dangerous, so stay close!
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_1100:
Red is the strongest Trainer in history, and that’s
his rival...
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_1200:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s opponents in the
PML finals were this strong?
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_1300:
Would I have even stood a chance if I’d made it to
the finals instead of [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_1400:
Hey! What’s going on here?! Don’t tell me
everyone got taken out!
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_1500: Are you the one responsible for this?!
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_1700:
Well...I guess it doesn’t matter. And you
know what? I can tell we have something in
common, kid. I can smell it on ya.
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_1900: You wanna get stronger, don’tcha? Just like us!
story_teamrocket_01_03000/2401_1201_2000:
Heh. Right on the money. OK, just between you
and me, lemme ask you a question.
